system.description: The character takes sadistic pleasure in attacking helpless foes, ensuring maximum damage against vulnerable enemies.
system.benefit: When making a Melee or Ranged Attack at Point Blank range against a Stunned or Prone enemy, the attack gains the Proven (4) Quality Proven X: If weapon damage die rolls less than X, treat as if X was rolled.

prerequisites.text: Dark Eldar, Pity the Weak, Weapon Skill 40

specialAbilities.name: Cruelty
specialAbilities.description: When making a Melee or Ranged Attack at Point Blank range against a Stunned or Prone enemy, the attack gains the Proven (4) Quality.
